resources.string:
Next feature release:
 · New: Google Play Services used for location (less battery usage)
 · New: Optional low power GPS mode for parts of the app which don't require high precision
 · New: Detect offline state and delay login until network is available
 · New: Voice search via Google Now (not available for all languages), say 'Search for topic in c:geo' 
 · New: Confirmation dialog for dangerous log types
 · New: Store found date of found caches when importing via GPX
 · New: Select a waypoint of a cache as target directly from compass
 · New: Suggestion for waypoint name depending on its type
 · New: Import lab caches as virtual caches
 · New: Remember zoom level of live map and cache map separately
 · New: Confirmation for deleting all offline logs
 · New: Menu item for repeating last log text
 · New: Set waypoint coordinates from clipboard content
 · Fix: Titlebar missing on map with Android 3.x
 · Fix: Improved compass rotation algorithm
 · Fix: Smilies fit line height in logbook
 · Fix: GcVote rating sometimes not shown when logging a cache
 · Fix: Caches with corrected coords sometimes shown on their listing coords on the map
 · Fix: Improved rendering of cache listings with many embedded image
 · Fix: Charter Members not recognized as Premium Members
 
 Known Limitations/Bugs:
 · Device menu button not working on map popup
 Please use the three dot button instead
 · Live map:
 Approximated coords due to limitations on the GC-website
 Be aware: If navigation is started directly from live map it may also use the approximated coords!
 In fast mode the cache type might be wrong in rare cases
 On low zoom owned/found caches may not be hidden anymore
